Klasse QuizDataManager

java.lang.Object
persistence.serialization.QuizDataManager
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
QuizDataInterface
public class QuizDataManager extends Object implements QuizDataInterface
Serialization-based data manager for quiz persistence.

This implementation of QuizDataInterface stores each theme as a separate serialized file located in ./quizData/theme_{id}.dat where id is the unique theme identifier.

Responsibilities:

  • Serializing and deserializing quiz theme objects
  • Providing CRUD operations on themes, questions, and answers
  • Managing listeners for updates on data changes
Seit:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Autor:
Christos Poulios

    • QuizDataManager

      public QuizDataManager()
      Creates a new QuizDataManager instance. Ensures that the quiz data directory exists, creating it if necessary.

  • Methodendetails

    • getThemeTitles

      public ArrayList<String> getThemeTitles()
      Returns a list of all theme titles from storage.
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList containing theme titles

    • getQuestionByGlobalIndex

      public QuestionDTO getQuestionByGlobalIndex(int idx)
      Retrieves a question by its global index across all themes.
      Parameter:
      idx - zero-based global index across all stored questions
      Gibt zurück:
      the QuestionDTO or null if index is invalid

    • getQuestionListEntries

      public ArrayList<String> getQuestionListEntries(String themeTitle)
      Returns a list of formatted question entries for a specified theme. If themeTitle is null or equals "Alle Themen", all questions from all themes are returned. Otherwise, only questions belonging to the provided theme are included.
      Parameter:
      themeTitle - Selected theme title or null/"Alle Themen" for all
      Gibt zurück:
      an ArrayList of formatted strings showing both title and a truncated preview of text

    • formatQuestionDisplay

      private String formatQuestionDisplay(QuestionDTO question, int number)
      Formats a question for list display combining title and a truncated preview of the question text.
      Parameter:
      question - the QuestionDTO to format
      number - the number of the question in the list
      Gibt zurück:
      formatted string for display purposes

    • addUpdateListener

      public void addUpdateListener(Runnable listener)
      Adds an observer/listener that will be notified whenever quiz data changes.
      Parameter:
      listener - Runnable callback to execute on updates

    • notifyListeners

      private void notifyListeners()
      Notifies all registered update listeners about a data change.

    • createAnswersFor

      private void createAnswersFor(QuestionDTO question)
      Creates default placeholder answers for a question if none exist. Useful for ensuring the UI has something to display.
      Parameter:
      question - the QuestionDTO to populate with answers

    • saveTheme

      public String saveTheme(ThemeDTO theme)
      Saves a theme to storage as a serialized file.

      If the theme has no ID yet, a new ID is generated automatically.

      Angegeben von:
      saveTheme in Schnittstelle QuizDataInterface
      Parameter:
      theme - the ThemeDTO to save
      Gibt zurück:
      success or error message

    • getAllThemes

      public ArrayList<ThemeDTO> getAllThemes()
      Loads all themes from storage.
      Angegeben von:
      getAllThemes in Schnittstelle QuizDataInterface
      Gibt zurück:
      list of all loaded ThemeDTOs

    • createNewThemeId

      private int createNewThemeId()
      Creates a new unique theme ID by finding the highest existing ID and adding 1.
      Gibt zurück:
      the next available theme ID

    • getRandomQuestion

      public QuestionDTO getRandomQuestion()
      Gets a random question from all available questions in storage.
      Angegeben von:
      getRandomQuestion in Schnittstelle QuizDataInterface
      Gibt zurück:
      a random QuestionDTO, or null if no questions exist

    • deleteTheme

      public String deleteTheme(ThemeDTO theme)
      Deletes a theme from storage by removing its serialized file.
      Angegeben von:

      Parameter:

      Gibt zurück:

    • getRandomQuestionFor

      public QuestionDTO getRandomQuestionFor(ThemeDTO theme)
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: QuizDataInterface

      Angegeben von:

      Parameter:

      Gibt zurück:

    • saveQuestion

      public String saveQuestion(QuestionDTO question)
      Beschreibung aus Schnittstelle kopiert: QuizDataInterface
      Saves a quiz question to storage.

      If new, it will be inserted; if it already exists, it will be updated.

      Angegeben von:
      saveQuestion in Schnittstelle QuizDataInterface
      Parameter:
      question - the QuestionDTO to save
      Gibt zurück:
      a status/result message, or null if successful without message
